label:
The violence was not
severe enough to be reported

He/she thinks that he/she should
not interfere in other family’s business.

He/she did not think that information he/she had
was enough to be reported to the respective institutions

He/she would feel uncomfortable
by getting involved.

He/she would not be sure that the
concrete action was repeated regularly

He/she was not sure that the institutions he/she
would address to would effectively solve the problem

He/she is nervous that after reporting the case,
aggression/beating/threat or blackmailing will
be addressed to him/her or his/her family members
